title: How to Order Fresh Salmon in Seattle

steps.headline: Educate yourself about salmon.
steps.description: To order fresh salmon in Seattle, it is first important to learn how to recognize the product. Unlike other types of fish, which often are described with only one name, salmon can be identified according to its color, the water it was caught it or by another name. Some common examples of types of salmon available in Seattle, Washington include Pacific, Alaskan, red, pink or sockeye. Recognizing a healthy salmon is also important when ordering this fish. Fresh raw salmon should have shiny flesh, clear eyes, and should be odor-free. The scales of the fish should all be securely attached, and should easily reflect light and sunshine.

steps.headline: Visit seafood markets.
steps.description: Seafood markets are a great place to order salmon in Seattle. While there are a number of large markets along the ocean piers, such as Pike Place Market, smaller markets can also be found further inland. Salmon can usually be found at a reasonable price at these markets. Consider going early in the morning for the best selection.

steps.headline: Shop at grocery stores.
steps.description: Salmon sold is grocery stores is often pre-trimmed, making it a good option for those who do not have the tools necessary to trim their salmon at home. Cooked salmon should be firm to the touch and should flake easily with a fork.

steps.headline: Those who do not wish to prepare the salmon at home can order it at a restaurant.
steps.description: Seattle is home to a number of seafood restaurants, many of which offer salmon on the menu. Speak with the waiter before settling on a particular item. Inquire as to the freshness of the fish, its breed and the date it was purchased. These questions can all provide detailed information as to the freshness of the salmon.

steps.headline: If you have visited the piers, grocery stores and restaurants and still are not happy with the salmon selection available, consider speaking with local Seattle residents.
steps.description: These individuals may be able to provide additional guidance as to ordering fresh salmon in Seattle.
